text: Following the M1 highway #bridgecollapse, Uber is offering free rides up to R250 to & from Gautrain stations until 9pm tonight.
Condolences and prayers to the families of those who lost their lives in today's #BridgeCollapse may the injured heal well
Scaffolding "@nos_mtshali: How does an entire bridge collapse ? There's a demon in Sandton. They're always having construction faults"
